hero.name: Kamel Ahmed
hero.title: AI Engineer
hero.subtitle: Building production-grade AI systems, not just demos.

about.heading: About Me
about.text: I am an AI Engineer at Link Datacenter (LDC) with a strong background in backend systems, automation, and production-ready LLM architectures. I focus on building AI systems that are reliable, observable, and scalable in real-world environments.
about.story: With a passion for solving complex problems through technology, I've dedicated my career to building robust AI systems that make a real impact. My journey started in test automation and backend development, which gave me a strong foundation in software engineering principles. Today, I specialize in production-grade RAG systems, LLM infrastructure, and agentic workflows that power real-world applications.

details: Designed and deployed production-grade RAG and Graph-RAG systems using Neo4j.
Built LLM infrastructure using vLLM on GPU clusters.
Developed AI APIs and agentic workflows using LangGraph and MCP.
Worked across backend, AI logic, infrastructure, and MLOps.
Built scalable automation frameworks using Java, Selenium, Cucumber.
Supported microservices on GCP and managed Oracle/MySQL databases.

projects.title: Production RAG System
projects.description: Built a scalable RAG system using Neo4j for knowledge graph storage, enabling semantic search and retrieval across large document corpora.

projects.title: LLM Infrastructure Platform
projects.description: Designed and deployed vLLM-based infrastructure for serving multiple LLM models on GPU clusters with efficient resource management.

projects.title: Agentic Workflow System
projects.description: Developed multi-agent systems using LangGraph and MCP for complex task orchestration and decision-making workflows.

projects.title: Housing Data Mining
projects.description: Developed a data mining system for housing data using Python and pandas.

items.name: Python
items.description: Backend APIs, data processing, ML pipelines

testimonials.quote: Kamel's expertise in building production-grade AI systems is exceptional. His RAG implementations have significantly improved our search capabilities.
testimonials.author: Tech Lead

testimonials.quote: Working with Kamel on automation frameworks was a great experience. He delivers robust, scalable solutions on time.
